summary: This bill, the Global Hunt for Offshore Smuggling and Trafficking Act of 2025 (GHOST Act), establishes a Russia Sanctions Enforcement Fund to finance seizures and forfeitures related to violations of U.S. sanctions against Russia and its covered merchant ships. The fund will cover expenses like investigative costs, detention of seized property, and rewards for informants. The bill also codifies the Export Enforcement Coordination Center within Homeland Security Investigations to improve interagency cooperation on export control enforcement.
